titlepage.p: © 2009 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Sound recordings of interviews, relating to the Nicaraguan revolution of 1979, Nicaraguan-Cuban relations, and the Nicaraguan contra guerrilla war. Includes typed notes made from the interviews. Interviews conducted by William E. Ratliff.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Use copies of some sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material in this collection are available for immediate access. The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Edén Pastora Gómez interviews, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1992.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Nicaraguan Sandinista and subsequently contra guerrilla leader.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Sound recordings of interviews, relating to the Nicaraguan revolution of 1979, Nicaraguan-Cuban relations, and the Nicaraguan contra guerrilla war. Includes typed notes made from the interviews. Interviews conducted by William E. Ratliff.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Guerrillas--Nicaragua.

did.unittitle: Sound Recordings of Edén Pastora Gómez interview by William Ratliff

scopecontent.p: Relates to Pastora Gómez's experiences in and observations on the Nicaraguan Revolution from its origins to the interviews in 1992, including relations with the United States and Cuba. Yolanda Pastora Gómez joins Edén in the interview on cassette 9. San Jose, Costa Rica. Cassettes 1-11

did.unittitle: Typed notes made from the interviews
